dct_description_sm: Great Britain. War Office. General Staff. Geographical Section. G.S.G.S. no. 4480. United States. Army. Co. "C" 660th Engineers. Map is in four sheets. In upper left margin: "Germany". In upper right margin: "Sheet 1".Map B: Annex to protocol on Zones of Occupation of Germany and the adminitration of "Greater Berlin" In lower right margin: "Copied from a German map dated 1937. Reproduced by Co. "C" 660th Engineers, U.S. Army". GPO-DSSO-3949. Map continued on inset "Number 4". Map shows boundaries of the parts of Berlin allotted to U.K, U.S.A., and U.S.S.R.
